author: Annie Gowen
title: Kansas court weighing whether to allow in-person Easter church services despite statewide ban on gatherings - The Washington Post
description: Kansas court weighing whether to allow in-person Easter church services despite statewide ban on gatherings The Washington Post Kansas Supreme Court hears arguments via Zoom amid coronavirus New York Post Kansas' High Court Weighs Virus Limits on Religious Se…
content: Gov. Laura Kelly, a Democrat, expanded a state stay-at-home order this week to include churches after state public-health officials traced coronavirus outbreaks, and three deaths, to four religious gatherings. Kansas has recorded 1,268 confirmed cases of the … [+5688 chars]
